\w I|strong="H3588"\w* will \w whistle|strong="H8319"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H6908"\w*, \w and|strong="H8319"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w them|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* \w them|strong="H6908"\w*: \w and|strong="H8319"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* will \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w them|strong="H6908"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* were \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* before.
